title: 302: CHATTY BROS: BIP Reflections + New Wives + Weekend Recaps
itunes:title: 302: CHATTY BROS: BIP Reflections + New Wives + Weekend Recaps
description:
Grayston and Evan are in the studio to recap the latest with Bachelor in Paradise aka the first half of the episode they tangentially talk about their weekends and their thoughts on The Broads talking about second husbands (00:00:00 - 00:48:00). Then they dive into their thoughts on BIP: praising Mari, breaking down the Chris/Alana situation, Brendan and Pieper (of course), Tammy’s goodbye, and passion about chemistry!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
